name: Covid Warfare
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2022.

 Our game is about an hypothetical battle between the VAX faction and the NO VAX faction. The two main characters use unique weapons inspired by their choice. 

May the strongest faction win! 

 

How to play:

  • Q-E -> Swich weapons
  •  R -> Reload weapon (only the first) 
  • Left Click -> Shoot
